name: Napoleon's Square
description:
A classic solitaire game.

The objective is to move all the cards from the tableau (bottom 12 stacks) and stock (middle) to the foundations (top 8 stacks). 

Cards can be added to the foundation if they are one rank higher and the same suit. 

Cards can be moved onto stacks in the tableau if they are one rank lower and the same suit. 

Flip cards over from the stock as needed. You can only work through the stock pile once.

Any card may be moved onto an empty stack in the tableau.

Credits:

  • Art assets by Kenney
  • Font: Poppins
